title: Eco Modern Duplex Retreat in Serene Rynek, Kazimierz Dolny
description: Experience harmony between modern living and authenticity in this stylish duplex featuring 3 bright bedrooms and 3 complete bathrooms. Seamlessly blending eco-conscious measures with contemporary comfort, the spacious 142 sqm layout flows onto private balconies overlooking a shared courtyard. Natural light fills the airy interiors, inviting you to relax or entertain in an environment crafted for sustainability and well-being.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in Rynek, a scenic neighborhood renowned for its peaceful suburban vibe, this property delivers tranquillity steps from the vibrant Kazimierz Dolny square and picturesque Vistula waterfront. Enjoy a relaxed lifestyle surrounded by greenery and family-friendly charm, all a short drive from essential amenities thanks to convenient highway access.
lifestyle_benefits: proximity to nature and river walks
target_buyer: Ideal for professionals or couples relocating for work who seek a stylish, eco-conscious home immersed in tranquility, yet accessible for city commutes or remote work.
market_positioning: Positioned as a unique opportunity for discerning buyers prioritizing sustainability and quality living, this duplex combines modern amenities with rare access to the peaceful and sought-after Kazimierz Dolny area. The offering stands out for its balance of privacy, connectedness and life-enhancing features, attracting buyers valuing the environment without sacrificing comfort or convenience.
